subject: Television
Football
Weddings and Engagements
Thanksgiving Day
lead_paragraph: Few wedding proposals captured the zeitgeist like the one between Rashad, the broadcaster, and the “Cosby Show” mom Phylicia Ayers-Allen on a Thanksgiving Day game broadcast in 1985.
snippet: Few wedding proposals captured the zeitgeist like the one between Rashad, the broadcaster, and the “Cosby Show” mom Phylicia Ayers-Allen on a Thanksgiving Day game broadcast in 1985.
